content: this legal document explains the progress of a case involving a dispute between coowners of inherited lands and buildings the plaintiff requested a division of the inheritance and collation of certain donations received the court considered the value of the donations and improvements made to the properties as well as the division of movable property and management of bank accounts the court determined the value of the donations and real estate properties made adjustments for expenses and prepared a divisional plan the court assigned three lots to the parties involved and specified the assets and adjustments for each lot the court also determined the boundaries of each lot and addressed the issue of determining the value of the usufruct the court concluded that the dispute has been resolved and made a final ruling assigning certain lots to the parties involved the court also determined the expenses that each party must pay compensated the parties for their litigation costs and settled the costs of the investigation
